home.description: Hi, welcome to my web site, my name is Lucas de Brito Silva and I'm {{idade}} years old. I consider myself an enthusiastic in Technology and I'm motivated by my dreams, and to accomplish them I sought to get qualified with Computer Technician course at ETEC Professor Massuyuki Kawano and I am currently enrolled to Big Data in Agribusiness course, being the first class to graduate in Brazil. I hope you enjoy my site, here we go!
